pages.title: Kamen Rider Kabuki
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Hibiki And The 7 Senki (2005, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:hibiki/devices/ongekiko#kabukidriver)Ongekiko$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Resistance III$(li)Haste II$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Fire Resistance$(li)Strength IV
